name: Ice-Fall
description:
This game was made for a GameJam "TutJam #3", where the theme was: "Christmas Chaos".

READ ALL INFORMATIONS BEFORE PLAYING!!! Instructions:

Move: A,D

Jump: Space / W

Restart level: R

Get a gift from Santa: E

Open a gift: Touch it

How to play?:

Avoid ice block falling on your head and get gifts from the santas that are falling like the ice blocks sometimes. Gifts can get you an upgrade or a downgrade, so don't be suprised when you loose points from a gift!

NOTES:

Snow Bombs DON'T kill you!

If an Ice Block falls on a Santa or a Gift, they are getting destroyed! so you gotta be fast!
